about.title: About Me
about.description1: I'm a passionate Full Stack Developer with over 5 years of experience, specialized in backend development and microservices architectures. Currently working at F√°brica Digital Scotiabank, where I develop critical banking solutions using Spring Boot, React, and Node.js.
about.description2: My experience spans from creating As a Service platforms with distributed architecture to developing microservices for the financial sector. I specialize in technologies like TypeScript, NestJS, Go, Java, and databases like PostgreSQL and MongoDB.
about.description3: I have certifications in TypeScript, React, NestJS, and Microservices with Spring Boot, which allows me to stay updated with industry best practices and contribute to innovative projects.
